data.text: Great hotel in a great location! The rooms and public spaces are lovely and well done. The hotel is in the middle of the gothic quarter so it’s close to many things, including great coffee shops and restaurants. The staff were also kind and helpful. We would definitely stay here again!
data.title: Great hotel in a great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tim M,
Thank you so much for taking the  time to share your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and found our location, rooms, and public spaces to your liking. We're also pleased to hear your kind words about our staff.
We would be honored to welcome you back for another wonderful stay in the future
Best wishes,

Ingrid Montes
owner_response.author: Sales Manager Madison

data.text:
Visited this weekend for my daughters 21st Birthday. The staff were fabulous from the moment we arrived. So pleasant and welcoming. They had even left a birthday treat in our room which was spotlessly clean.
The location couldn't have been better. 
Our only small gripe was the roof terrace. Whilst it is stunning and a welcome addition to a central hotel, €72 for 4 cocktails, patatas bravas and a caesar salad seems excessive. My burger and her steak on one night were not cooked as asked either. Staff however did take away and cook further without issues. 

Overall, highly recommended. What made it for us, was the staff.
data.title: Perfect location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear lucyIX9034GJ,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your recent visit for your daughter's 21st birthday. We're delighted to hear that our staff made your stay memorable with their warmth and hospitality.
We genuinely value your input as it helps us continuously improve and provide better experiences for our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with an even more enjoyable stay.
Best wishes,
owner_response.author: Sales Manager Madison

data.text:
H10 Madison is a very nice hotel located in city center, near by Barcelona Cathedral and Gothic quarter. Metro station is 5 minutes walk.
Hotel room is very nice, the breakfast is good and hotel staff is very professional and kind.
There is a wonderful view on the rooftop with a small bar and small swimming pool.
data.title: Nice experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear iTraveler13,
Thank you very much for your kind mention of our hotel.

We are very happy to know you enjoyed the location and services. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future!

Best regards
owner_response.author: Sales Manager Madison

data.text: A great stay in the heart of the Gothic Quarter in Barcelona. Walking distance to many remarkable sites and great restaurants. The staff and management were completely engaged, unbelievably helpful, friendly and accommodating. They were really guest focused. The lobby, rooms and rooftop bar/pool were beautiful and comfortable. The concierge service was always informed, ready and available. A special thanks to Glenn and Erick, as they went beyond the call of duty to help me resolve a last minute FC Barcelona football ticket situation. I highly recommend staying here.
data.title: Great Stay H10 Madison Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MoreLikeIt,

Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience at H10 Madison Barcelona! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay.

It's fantastic to know that you found our location convenient for exploring sites and enjoying the great restaurants nearby. We take great pride in our attentive and friendly staff, and we're delighted that Glenn and Erick were able to go above and beyond to assist you. Providing excellent service is a top priority for us, and we're pleased that you found them informed, ready, and available throughout your stay.
Thank you for recommending H10 Madison Barcelona, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!

Warm regards,

Ingrid Montes
owner_response.author: Comerc Madison

data.text: This was such a luxury hotel I wish I could stay there again. Very comfortable rooms, friendly staff (got our room organized ahead of time), and a stunning view from the rooftop pool of the Barcelona Cathedral. The tapas and wine in the rooftop bar were also excellent.
data.title: Worth revisiting

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Brigitao2020, 
Thank you very much for taking the time to leave such a positive review on TripAdvisor! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. We appreciate your support and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for another fantastic experience. 
Best wishes,
Ingrid Montes
owner_response.author: Comerc Madison
